content:
Flink VIS Vast Challenge 2022 Performed data aggregation, analysis and transformation using PySpark on 1,000 participants status logs Visualized travel journal data using maps, line charts, with filters to present the current traffic condition using Tableau Derived insights on the commute pattern over time and provided suggestions on potential bottlenecks Mar 2023 - May 2023
Deep Convolutional Neural Network For Limit Order Books Implemented a DeepLOB model based on HSI data (replicate the model raised up in the paper https://arxiv.org/abs/1808.03668)
Estimating Risk of Hepatic Complications in Patients with Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease - Risk Stratification and Treatment Recommendation A R package for systematically cleaning and analyzing data retrieved from Clinical Data Analysis and Reporting System (CDARS) to improve efficiency and optimize workflow (Ongoing)
Functions including but not limited to Read in raw reports generated from CDARS and delete useless information Merge files in different types and convert them into different types Find the first diagnosis date, procedure date of patients for certain diseases Calculate the dispensing duration for certain medication treatments Exclude non-target patients and build a flow chart
Mar 2021 - Jun 2021
Ridesharing System, Introduction to Database Systems Coursework Designed a database to manage data relevant to ridesharing including an ER-diagram and a relational schema
Implemented the system as a Java command-line program
Provided an interactive interface to system administrators, passengers, managers, and drivers
Sep 2020 – Dec 2020
IEEE-CIS Fraud Detection Can you detect fraud from customer transactions?
Conducted exploratory data analysis and feature engineering to identify credit card user account through transaction information
Implemented, trained, and optimized machine learning models including KNN, Classification tree, etc.
Nov 2019 – Dec 2019
Customer Voice Program, CitySuper Group Helped CitySuper Group to analyze their customer surveys based on 3 rounds data with 4000+ responses to know the customer satisfaction levels towards 6 different aspects and gave recommendations Sep 2019 – Oct 2019
Bottled Water Market Research, Dah Chong Hong Holdings Conducted market research on mainland bottled water market, focusing on competitive landscape, market sizes and prospects for different product categories respectively Jul 2018 – Aug 2018

title: Gallery

content:
About me I am a master student from Big Data Technology program at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST). I have a strong passion for data science. I enjoy the process of deriving insights from massive data. I am a fast learner and always eager to learn new things so that I’m very open to other’s opinions.
With a strong foundation in statistics from a Bachelor of Science degree, I embarked on a career as a research assistant in a medical school, where I honed my analytical skills in a healthcare setting.
This experience led to a position as a research assistant in the Statistics department at CUHK, further deepening my expertise in statistical methodologies.
Driven by a passion for data, I pursued a Master of Science in Big Data Technology, equipping myself with advanced skills in data analytics and technology.
Leveraging this comprehensive background, I transitioned into a role as a data analyst at DBS Bank in the audit department, where I apply my expertise to enhance data-driven decision-making processes.
My past experience Bachelor of Science in Statistic Research assistant in Medical school Research assistant in Statistic CUHK Master of science in Big data Technology Data analyst in DBS bank in audit department Can you draft a paragraph describing my transitions in the above stages?
Learn more about me
summary:
